machine_end_gcode:
G91 ;Relative positioning
G1 Z10 ;Raise Z more
G1 E-0.5 F2700 ;Retract a bit
G1 E-0.5 Z0.2 F2400 ;Retract and raise Z
G1 X5 Y5 F3000 ;Wipe out
G90 ;Absolute positioning

G1 X10 Y100 ;Present print
M106 S0 ;Turn-off fan
M104 S0 ;Turn-off hotend
M140 S0 ;Turn-off bed

;M84 X Y E ;Disable all steppers but Z
PRINT_END
machine_start_gcode:
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single]
G28
PRINT_START EXTRUDER=[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] BED=[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single]
BED_MESH_CALIBRATE PROFILE=default
BED_MESH_PROFILE LOAD=default

M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]

; Ender 3 Custom Start G-code 
;G92 E0 ; Reset Extruder 
;G1 Z4.0 F3000 ; Move Z Axis up little to prevent scratching of Heat Bed 
;G1 X2.1 Y20 Z4.0 F5000.0 ; Move to start position 
;G1 Z0.3 F500.0 ; Move to start position 
;G1 X2.1 Y200.0 Z0.3 F1500.0 E15 ; Draw the first line 
;G1 X2.4 Y200.0 Z0.3 F5000.0 ; Move to side a little 
;G1 X2.4 Y20 Z0.3 F1500.0 E30 ; Draw the second line 
;G92 E0 ; Reset Extruder 
;G1 Z2.0 F3000 ; Move Z Axis up little to prevent scratching of Heat Bed 
;G1 X5 Y20 Z0.3 F5000.0 ; Move over to prevent blob squish

G92 E0.0
G1 X{first_layer_print_min[0]-10} Y{first_layer_print_min[1]} Z0.8 F6000.0
G1 X{first_layer_print_min[0]-10} Y{first_layer_print_min[1]+30} E30 F360.0;
G92 E0.0
G1 E-0.5 F2100;
G1 Y{first_layer_print_min[1]+40} F6000.0
G29 E0.0
name: Ender3 Klipper
